name: Don't Squish the Spider (Completed)
description: Don’t Squish the Spider is a strategy game that allows you to control the spider by making it move back and forth. As you move the spider you have to be careful not to let it get squished, hence the title of the game. If by any chance the spider does get squished, you have to start from the beginning. But if you reach the end of each level you win.
